TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

Docs.summary: Forms the basis for the strongly typed collections that are members of the namespace.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetKey(object value) cil managed

Docs.param: An object for which to return the name of the key.
Docs.summary: Returns the name of the key associated with the value passed by reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class in order to return the name of the key associated with the `value` parameter. The default implementation returns null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClear() cil managed

Docs.summary: Clears the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is intended to be overridden to perform additional processes when clearing the contents of a derived collection. This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnInsertComplete (int index, object value);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInsertComplete(int32 index, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index at which to insert the `value` parameter.
The element to insert into the collection.
Docs.summary: Performs additional custom processes after inserting a new element into the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action when the specified element is inserted. For example, a derived class might need additional validation.
This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnRemove (int index, object value);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnRemove(int32 index, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the `value` parameter to be removed.
The element to remove from the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is intended to be overridden to perform additional processes, such as validation, when an element is removed from the collection.
This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnSet (int index, object oldValue, object newValue);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSet(int32 index, object oldValue, object newValue) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index where the `oldValue` parameter can be found.
The object to replace with the `newValue` parameter.
The object that replaces the `oldValue` parameter.
Docs.summary: Replaces one value with another within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden to perform additional processes, such as validation, when setting the value of an element in the collection. This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void SetParent (object value, object parent);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetParent(object value, object parent) cil managed

Docs.param: The object for which to set the parent object.
The object to set as the parent.
Docs.summary: Sets the parent object of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to set a parent of an appropriate class, based upon the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification. The default implementation performs no action. This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.

Docs.summary: Gets an interface that implements the association of the keys and values in the .
Docs.value: An interface that implements the association of the keys and values in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default implementation returns a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> to associate the keys and values. This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
